UPDATE CAR_LIST SET CAR_STATUS_CD='C011' WHERE CAR_NO=#{carNo}
mapper.select: SELECT *, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT(POSITION_CD, 3), POSITION_CD) AS CODE_NAME FROM CAR_RESERVATION CR INNER JOIN CAR_LIST CL ON CR.CAR_NO = CL.CAR_NO INNER JOIN HUMAN_RESOURCE HR ON CR.EMPLOYEE_ID = HR.EMPLOYEE_ID WHERE CL.CAR_STATUS_CD = 'C012' AND (CR.CAR_NO, CR.RENTAL_NO) IN ( SELECT CAR_NO, MAX(RENTAL_NO) AS MAX_RENTAL_NO FROM CAR_RESERVATION WHERE CAR_STATUS_CD = 'C012' GROUP BY CAR_NO );
SELECT FN_CODE_NM(LEFT(POSITION_CD,3),POSITION_CD) AS CODE_NAME FROM HUMAN_RESOURCE WHERE EMPLOYEE_ID=#{employeeID}

SELECT CL.CAR_MODEL_NAME, MAX(CR.RENTAL_DATE) AS RENTAL_DATE, MAX(CR.RETURN_DATE) AS RETURN_DATE, MAX(CR.EMPLOYEE_ID) AS EMPLOYEE_ID, CL.CAR_STATUS_CD, MAX(HR.NAME) AS NAME, MAX(FN_CODE_NM(LEFT(POSITION_CD, 3), POSITION_CD)) AS CODE_NAME FROM CAR_RESERVATION CR INNER JOIN CAR_LIST CL ON CR.CAR_NO = CL.CAR_NO INNER JOIN HUMAN_RESOURCE HR ON CR.EMPLOYEE_ID = HR.EMPLOYEE_ID WHERE CL.CAR_STATUS_CD = 'C012' GROUP BY CL.CAR_MODEL_NAME, CL.CAR_STATUS_CD
SELECT *, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT(POSITION_CD, 3), POSITION_CD) AS CODE_NAME FROM CLIENT_LIST CL INNER JOIN HUMAN_RESOURCE HR ON CL.EMPLOYEE_ID = HR.EMPLOYEE_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLIENT_LIST ( CLIENT_NO, CLIENT_NAME, EMPLOYEE_ID, CLIENT_TYPE_CD, CLIENT_REPRESENT, CLIENT_NUMBER, CLIENT_ADDRESS, CLIENT_ZIPCODE, CLIENT_REF_ADDRESS, CLIENT_DETAIL_ADDRESS, CLIENT_DATE, CLIENT_INDUSTRY, CLIENT_MANAGER, CLIENT_PHONE, CLIENT_BANK, CLIENT_ACCOUNT_NO, CLIENT_BANK_NAME, REG_ID, REG_DATE, REG_MENU, MOD_ID, MOD_DATE, MOD_MENU ) VALUES ( 0, #{clientName}, #{employeeId}, #{clientTypeCd}, #{clientRepresent}, #{clientNumber}, #{clientAddress}, #{clientZipCode}, #{clientRefAddress}, #{clientDetailAddress}, #{clientDate}, #{clientIndustry}, #{clientManager}, #{clientPhone}, #{clientBank}, #{clientAccountNo}, #{clientBankName}, #{regId}, #{regDate}, #{regMenu}, #{modId}, #{modDate}, #{modMenu} )
mapper.select: select DISTINCT CL.CLIENT_NO, CL.*, FN_CODE_NM(LEFT(POSITION_CD, 3), POSITION_CD) AS CODE_NAME from CLIENT_LIST CL INNER JOIN HUMAN_RESOURCE HR ON CL.CLIENT_MANAGER = HR.NAME WHERE CLIENT_NO=#{clientNo}
